_assets.title: Class 1 Medicines Recall (Action Now – including out of hours): Lipid Phase only of Parenteral Nutrition manufactured by ITH Pharma Limited (EL (14)A/05) (134Kb)

body:
## DRUG ALERT

Class 1 Medicines Recall

Action Now – including out of hours

  


Hospital Level Recall  
  
04 June 2014  |   |  EL (14)A/05  |   |  Our ref:  MDR 02-06/14   | 

* * *

Dear Healthcare Professional,

ITH Pharma Limited

Lipid Phase only of Parenteral Nutrition

MS 66364

ITH Pharma Ltd is recalling specific batches of Lipid Phase Parenteral Nutrition from specific hospitals detailed in the attached Appendix. This is because of a potential contamination with Bacillus cereus identified following a small number of reported cases of Bacillus cereus septicaemia affecting neonates. 

All batches have expired and it is believed that there is little or no stock remaining in the market.

The specific batches should no longer be used and any remaining stocks should be quarantined.  Please contact the Public Health England national incident team on 020 7811 7800 should you have any remaining stocks of these batches.

For medical information and stock enquiries please contact ITH Pharma Ltd on 0208 838 8260 or email [Info@ithpharma.com](mailto:Info@ithpharma.com)

Recipients of this Drug Alert should bring it to the attention of relevant contacts by copy of this letter.

Yours faithfully

Adam Burgess  
Defective Medicines Report Centre  
151 Buckingham Palace Road  
London  
SW1W 9SZ

Telephone +44 (0)20 3080 6574

### Appendix
